headline: Argo Tunnels: Spread the Load
keywords: Argo Smart Routing, Product News, Speed & Reliability, Reliability, Load Balancing, Cloudflare Tunnel
description: We recently announced Argo Tunnel which allows you to deploy your applications anywhere, even if your webserver is sitting behind a NAT or firewall. Now, with support for load balancing, you can spread the traffic across your tunnels.
